name: SHOUT STRIKE: Xrd Revolution V.S.
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

*Only supports Xbox (360/One) Controllers.

DESCRIPTION

An action filled versus game for up to 4 Players where you build up anime-sounding attacks to defeat your opponents. Every 10 seconds a new group of attacks will appear at the top of the screen, match them with your elements and finish it off with a volley or slash to vanquish your foes. The longer the combo, the stronger the attack will be!

INSTRUCTIONS
  • Look at the combos at the top of the screen
  • Match words with the ABXY-buttons
  • More words means higher power for your attack
CONTROLLERS

LS: Aim

A/B/X/Y: Select Element

LB: Volley Shot

RB: Slash Attack

KNOWN ISSUES
  • Sprite might dissapear at start.
